rooms.description: A spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows offering expansive views. The design is influenced by Brutalist style with raw concrete elements and minimalist aesthetics.
Compact kitchen area integrated into the living space, utilizing modern fixtures while retaining a Brutalist design aesthetic.
A studio bedroom that doubles as a workspace with ample storage and built-in closets. Designed for flexible use in line with Vastu principles ensuring energy flow.
An open, landscaped courtyard at the center of the layout to enhance natural light and ventilation, following Vastu guidelines for harmony.
A designated swimming pool area featuring an integrated pool with surrounding deck space. The design integrates Brutalist elements for aesthetic contrast while ensuring safety and functionality.

openings.description: A reinforced concrete door that provides transition between the living area and private studio space, ensuring privacy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows enhancing natural light, aligned with Vastu for optimal energy flow.
Large window installation ensuring ample daylight and a view of the courtyard.
A grand gateway entrance to the courtyard, emphasizing the Brutalist aesthetic with exposed materials.
